learning.unsupervised.evaluation.quality.experimental

Class QualityIndexEvalInHighDim

  • java.lang.Object
    • learning.unsupervised.evaluation.quality.experimental.QualityIndexEvalInHighDim

  • public class QualityIndexEvalInHighDim
extends java.lang.Object
    This script evaluates the robustness of various clustering configuration quality indices as the dimensionality of the data is increased. It helps with estimating how the quantities change and hence how they can be interpreted.

    • Constructor Detail

      • QualityIndexEvalInHighDim

        public QualityIndexEvalInHighDim(int dim,
                         int numDatasets,
                         int numClusters,
                         int numPoints,
                         int minClusterSize,
                         int maxClusterSize)
        Initialization.
        Parameters:
        dim - Integer that is the number of dimensions to generate the synthetic data by.
        numDatasets - Integer that is the number of datasets to generate.
        numClusters - Integer that is the number of clusters to generate in each dataset.
        numPoints - Integer that is the data size to generate in the balanced separated mixtures.
        minClusterSize - Integer that is the minimal cluster size for the imbalanced overlapping mixtures.
        maxClusterSize - Integer that is the maximal cluster size for the imbalanced overlapping mixtures.

      • setNumCommonThreads

        public void setNumCommonThreads(int numCommonThreads)
        Parameters:
        numCommonThreads - Integer value that is the number of common threads to use for operations like calculating the distance matrix and the kNN sets.

      • setNeighborhoodSize

        public void setNeighborhoodSize(int k)
        Parameters:
        k - Integer value that is the neighborhood size to use for indexes like the isolation index where the kNN sets are required.

      • setNumClusteringReps

        public void setNumClusteringReps(int numClusteringReps)
        Parameters:
        numClusteringReps - Integer value that is the number of times that the clustering is to be performed on each dataset.

      • main

        public static void main(java.lang.String[] args)
                 throws java.lang.Exception
        This script runs the experiments to evaluate various clustering quality indices on synthetic data of the specified dimensionality.
        Parameters:
        args - Command line parameters, as specified.
        Throws:
        java.lang.Exception
